description:
Mech Invasion 2: Air Assault is an insanely fun game that builds on the tremendous success of Mech Invasion. This is another Tower Defense style of game that includes unique dynamics not seen in other tower defense games.  Tower Defense is one of the best game styles for mobile gaming - and this one is no exception!  Whether you're trying to get perfect placement and timing in 'Timing is Everything', or you're trying to fend off a massive air invasion in one of the new mountain levels, I'm sure you'll love this version of Mech Invasion.  Everyone has been clammoring for more levels and more fun, here you have it.  This version includes 12 new levels and makes use of three new backgrounds.  12 new levels should be enough to get you started again - but we're not stopping at 12!  Feedback is encouraged, feel free to contact javasanity(at)gmail.com with any suggestions or if you're having any trouble.
Update: Added level 24.  Only one dimension to the level, but you have to stay really busy placing bases to win.
